70 /* Flag to check input parameters */
71 #define DEBUG_CHECK_PARAMS 1

73 /* HWA ping/pong buffers offset */
74 #define DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_SRC_PING_OFFSET ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(obj->hwaMemBankAddr[0])
75 #define DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_SRC_PONG_OFFSET ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(obj->hwaMemBankAddr[1])
76 #define DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_DST_PING_OFFSET ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(obj->hwaMemBankAddr[2])
77 #define DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_DST_PONG_OFFSET ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(obj->hwaMemBankAddr[3])

89 static void DPU_DopplerProcHWA_hwaDoneIsrCallback(void * arg)
90 {
91  if (arg != NULL) {
92  SemaphoreP_post((SemaphoreP_Handle)arg);
93  }
94 }
95 
102 static void DPU_DopplerProcHWA_edmaDoneIsrCallback(uintptr_t arg,
103  uint8_t transferCompletionCode)
104 {
105  if (arg != NULL) {
106  SemaphoreP_post((SemaphoreP_Handle)arg);
107  }
108 }
109 
122 static inline int32_t DPU_DopplerProcHWA_configHwa
123 (
124  DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Obj *obj,
125  DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Config *cfg
126 )
127 {
128  HWA_ParamConfig hwaParamCfg[DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_MAX_NUM_HWA_PARAMSET];
129  HWA_InterruptConfig paramISRConfig;
130  uint32_t paramsetIdx = 0;
131  uint32_t pingSumParamsetIdx;
132  int32_t retVal = 0U;
133  uint32_t k;
134  uint8_t destChan;
135 
136  /* Check if we have the correct number of paramsets.*/
137  if(cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.numParamSets != (2 * cfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas + 2))
138  {
139  retVal = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_EHWARES;
140  goto exit;
141  }
142 
143  memset((void*) &hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx], 0, sizeof(HWA_ParamConfig));
144 
145  /************* Doppler FFT for first TX antenna *********************************/
146  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA;
147  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dmaTriggerSrc = obj->hwaDmaTriggerSourcePing;
148  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_FFT;
149 
150  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAddr = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_SRC_PING_OFFSET; // address is relative to start of MEM0
151  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAcnt = cfg->staticCfg.numDopplerChirps - 1; //size in samples - 1
152 
153  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAIdx = cfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
154  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcBcnt = cfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas - 1;
155  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcBIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
156  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcShift = 0;
157  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcCircShiftWrap = 0;
158  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcRealComplex = 0; //complex data
159  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT;
160  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
161  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
162  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcScale = 0;
163  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.bpmEnable = 0;
164  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.bpmPhase = 0;
165 
166  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAddr = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_DST_PING_OFFSET; // address is relative to start of MEM0
167  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAcnt = cfg->staticCfg.numDopplerBins - 1; //this is samples - 1
168  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAIdx = cfg->staticCfg.numVirtualAntennas * sizeof(uint16_t);
169  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstBIdx = sizeof(uint16_t);
170  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstRealComplex = 1; //Real
171  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT;
172  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_UNSIGNED;
173  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
174  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstScale = 0;
175  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstSkipInit = 0;
176 
177  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
178  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = cfg->staticCfg.log2NumDopplerBins;
179 
180  /* scaling is enabled in all stages except for the first stage which is defined by user*/
181  if(cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.firstStageScaling == DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_FIRST_SCALING_DISABLED)
182  {
183  /* Enable scaling on all stages except first one.*/
184  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = (cfg->staticCfg.numDopplerBins - 1) >> 1;
185  }
186  else
187  {
188  /* Enable scaling on all stages.*/
189  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = (cfg->staticCfg.numDopplerBins - 1);
190  }
191 
192  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.interfZeroOutEn = 0; //disabled
193  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 1; //enabled
194  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowStart = cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.winRamOffset;
195  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.winSymm = cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.winSym;
196  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.winInterpolateMode = 0; //fftsize is less than 1K
197  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_ENABLED;
198  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftOutMode = HWA_FFT_MODE_OUTPUT_DEFAULT;
199 
200  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
201  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(obj->hwaHandle,
202  cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + paramsetIdx,
203  &hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx], NULL);
204  if (retVal != 0)
205  {
206  goto exit;
207  }
208 
209  /* Make sure DMA interrupt/trigger is disabled for this paramset*/
210  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(obj->hwaHandle,
211  cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + paramsetIdx,
212  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
213  if (retVal != 0)
214  {
215  goto exit;
216  }
217 
218  /************* Doppler FFT for remaining TX antennas *********************************/
219  for (paramsetIdx = 1; paramsetIdx < cfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas; paramsetIdx++)
220  {
221  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx] = hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx-1];
222  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAddr += sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) * cfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas * cfg->staticCfg.numDopplerChirps;
223  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAddr += sizeof(uint16_t) * cfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas;
224  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
225 
226  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(obj->hwaHandle,
227  cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + paramsetIdx,
228  &hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx], NULL);
229  if (retVal != 0)
230  {
231  goto exit;
232  }
233 
234  /* Make sure DMA interrupt/trigger is disabled for this paramset*/
235  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(obj->hwaHandle,
236  cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + paramsetIdx,
237  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
238  if (retVal != 0)
239  {
240  goto exit;
241  }
242  }
243 
244  /************* Sum of magnitudes *********************************/
245  pingSumParamsetIdx = paramsetIdx;
246  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx], 0, sizeof(HWA_ParamConfig));
247  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
248  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_FFT;
249 
250  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAddr = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_DST_PING_OFFSET; // address is relative to start of MEM0
251  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAcnt = cfg->staticCfg.numVirtualAntennas-1; //size in samples - 1
252 
253  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAIdx = sizeof(uint16_t);
254  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcBcnt = cfg->staticCfg.numDopplerBins - 1;
255  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcBIdx = cfg->staticCfg.numVirtualAntennas * sizeof(uint16_t);
256  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcShift = 0;
257  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcCircShiftWrap = 0;
258  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcRealComplex = 1; //real data
259  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT;
260  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_UNSIGNED;
261  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
262  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcScale = 2;
263  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.bpmEnable = 0;
264  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.bpmPhase = 0;
265 
266  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAddr = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_SRC_PING_OFFSET; // address is relative to start of MEM0
267 
268  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAcnt = 1 - 1; //get only bin zero
269  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(uint16_t);
270  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstBIdx = sizeof(uint16_t); // size of one output sample
271  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstRealComplex = 1;
272  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT;
273  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_UNSIGNED;
274  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
275  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstScale = 8;
276  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstSkipInit = 0; // no skipping
277 
278  if(cfg->staticCfg.numVirtualAntennas == 1)
279  {
280  /*If number of virtual antennas is 1, do not use FFT to compute sum magnitude.*/
281  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 0;
282  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = 1;
283  }
284  else
285  {
286  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
287  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_ceilLog2(cfg->staticCfg.numVirtualAntennas);
288  }
289  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0x3FF;
290  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.interfZeroOutEn = 0;
291  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0;
292  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowStart = 0;
293  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.winSymm = cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.winSym;
294  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.winInterpolateMode = 0;
295  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_DISABLED;
296  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftOutMode = HWA_FFT_MODE_OUTPUT_DEFAULT;
297 
298  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
299  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(obj->hwaHandle,
300  cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + paramsetIdx,
301  &hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx],
302  NULL);
303  if (retVal != 0)
304  {
305  goto exit;
306  }
307 
308  /************ Enable the DMA hookup to this paramset so that data gets copied out ***********/
309  /* First, make sure all DMA interrupt/trigger are disabled for this paramset*/
310  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(obj->hwaHandle,
311  cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + paramsetIdx,
312  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
313  if (retVal != 0)
314  {
315  goto exit;
316  }
317 
318  retVal = HWA_getDMAChanIndex(obj->hwaHandle,
319  cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaOut.ping.channel,
320  &destChan);
321  if (retVal != 0)
322  {
323  goto exit;
324  }
325  /* Now enable interrupt */
326  paramISRConfig.interruptTypeFlag = HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA;
327  paramISRConfig.dma.dstChannel = destChan;
328  paramISRConfig.cpu.callbackArg = NULL;
329  retVal = HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(obj->hwaHandle, cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + paramsetIdx, &paramISRConfig);
330  if (retVal != 0)
331  {
332  goto exit;
333  }
334  paramsetIdx++;
335 
336  /******************** programming HWACC for the pong buffer ****************************/
337  /************* Doppler FFT for all TX antennas on pong *********************************/
338  for (k=0; k < cfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas; k++)
339  {
340  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx] = hwaParamCfg[k];
341 
342  if (k == 0)
343  {
344  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dmaTriggerSrc = obj->hwaDmaTriggerSourcePong;
345  }
346 
347  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAddr = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_SRC_PONG_OFFSET +
348  k * (sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) * cfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas * cfg->staticCfg.numDopplerChirps);
349  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAddr = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_DST_PONG_OFFSET +
350  k * (sizeof(uint16_t) * cfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas);
351 
352  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(obj->hwaHandle,
353  cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + paramsetIdx,
354  &hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx],
355  NULL);
356  if (retVal != 0)
357  {
358  goto exit;
359  }
360 
361  /* Make sure DMA interrupt/trigger is disabled for this paramset*/
362  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(obj->hwaHandle,
363  cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + paramsetIdx,
364  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
365  if (retVal != 0)
366  {
367  goto exit;
368  }
369 
370  paramsetIdx++;
371  }
372 
373  /************* Sum of magnitudes for pong*********************************/
374  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx] = hwaParamCfg[pingSumParamsetIdx];
375  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAddr = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_DST_PONG_OFFSET;
376  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAddr = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_SRC_PONG_OFFSET;
377 
378  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(obj->hwaHandle,
379  cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + paramsetIdx,
380  &hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx],
381  NULL);
382  if (retVal != 0)
383  {
384  goto exit;
385  }
386 
387  /************ Enable the DMA hookup to this paramset so that data gets copied out ***********/
388  /* First, make sure all DMA interrupt/trigger are disabled for this paramset*/
389  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(obj->hwaHandle,
390  cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + paramsetIdx,
391  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
392  if (retVal != 0)
393  {
394  goto exit;
395  }
396 
397  retVal = HWA_getDMAChanIndex(obj->hwaHandle,
398  cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaOut.pong.channel,
399  &destChan);
400  if (retVal != 0)
401  {
402  goto exit;
403  }
404 
405  /*Now enable interrupt*/
406  paramISRConfig.interruptTypeFlag = HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA;
407  paramISRConfig.dma.dstChannel = destChan; //EDMA channel to trigger to copy the data out
408  paramISRConfig.cpu.callbackArg = NULL;
409  retVal = HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(obj->hwaHandle,
410  cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + paramsetIdx,
411  &paramISRConfig);
412  if (retVal != 0)
413  {
414  goto exit;
415  }
416 
417 exit:
418  return(retVal);
419  }
420 
435 static inline int32_t DPU_DopplerProcHWA_configEdma
436 (
437  DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Obj *obj,
438  DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Config *cfg
439 )
440 {
441  int32_t retVal = EDMA_NO_ERROR;
442  cmplx16ImRe_t *radarCubeBase = (cmplx16ImRe_t *)cfg->hwRes.radarCube.data;
443  uint16_t *detMatrixBase = (uint16_t *)cfg->hwRes.detMatrix.data;
444  int16_t sampleLenInBytes = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
445  uint32_t sizeOfAbsTransfer = cfg->staticCfg.numDopplerBins;
446  uint32_t sizeOfAbsTransferBytes = sizeOfAbsTransfer * sizeof(uint16_t);
447  DPEDMA_ChainingCfg chainingCfg;
448  DPEDMA_syncACfg syncACfg;
449  DPEDMA_syncABCfg syncABCfg;
450 
451  if(obj == NULL)
452  {
453  retVal = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_EINVAL;
454  goto exit;
455  }
456 
457  /**************PROGRAM DMA'S FOR PING**************************************/
458 
459  /***************************************************************************
460  * PROGRAM DMA channel to transfer 2D abs data from accelerator output
461  * buffer (ping) to L3
462  **************************************************************************/
463  chainingCfg.chainingChan = cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaIn.ping.channel;
464  chainingCfg.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = true;
465  chainingCfg.isFinalChainingEnabled = false;
466 
467  syncACfg.srcAddress = (uint32_t)obj->hwaMemBankAddr[0];
468  syncACfg.destAddress = (uint32_t)(&detMatrixBase[0]);
469  syncACfg.aCount = sizeOfAbsTransferBytes;
470  syncACfg.bCount = cfg->staticCfg.numRangeBins / 2U; //factor of 2 due to ping/pong
471  syncACfg.srcBIdx = 0;
472  syncACfg.dstBIdx = sizeOfAbsTransferBytes * 2U;//factor of 2 due to ping/pong
473 
474  retVal = DPEDMA_configSyncA_singleFrame(cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaHandle,
475  &cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaOut.ping,
476  &chainingCfg,
477  &syncACfg,
478  true, //isEventTriggered
479  false,//isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled
480  false,//isTransferCompletionEnabled
481  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
482  NULL);//transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg
483 
484  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
485  {
486  goto exit;
487  }
488 
489  /******************************************************************************************
490  * PROGRAM DMA channel to transfer data from Radar cube to accelerator input buffer (ping)
491  ******************************************************************************************/
492  chainingCfg.chainingChan = cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaHotSig.ping.channel;
493  chainingCfg.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = true;
494  chainingCfg.isFinalChainingEnabled = true;
495 
496  syncABCfg.srcAddress = (uint32_t)(&radarCubeBase[0]);
497  syncABCfg.destAddress = (uint32_t)(obj->hwaMemBankAddr[0]);
498  syncABCfg.aCount = sampleLenInBytes;
499  syncABCfg.bCount = cfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas * cfg->staticCfg.numDopplerChirps * cfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas;
500  syncABCfg.cCount = cfg->staticCfg.numRangeBins / 2;//factor of 2 due to ping/pong
501  syncABCfg.srcBIdx = cfg->staticCfg.numRangeBins * sampleLenInBytes;
502  syncABCfg.dstBIdx = sampleLenInBytes;
503  syncABCfg.srcCIdx = 2 * sampleLenInBytes;//factor of 2 due to ping/pong
504  syncABCfg.dstCIdx = 0;
505 
506  retVal = DPEDMA_configSyncAB(cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaHandle,
507  &cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaIn.ping,
508  &chainingCfg,
509  &syncABCfg,
510  false,//isEventTriggered
511  true, //isIntermediateTransferCompletionEnabled
512  false,//isTransferCompletionEnabled
513  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
514  NULL);//transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg
515 
516  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
517  {
518  goto exit;
519  }
520 
521  /******************************************************************************************
522  * PROGRAM DMA channel to trigger HWA for processing of input (ping)
523  ******************************************************************************************/
524  retVal = DPEDMAHWA_configOneHotSignature(cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaHandle,
525  &cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaHotSig.ping,
526  obj->hwaHandle,
527  obj->hwaDmaTriggerSourcePing,
528  false);
529 
530  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
531  {
532  goto exit;
533  }
534 
535  /**************PROGRAM DMA'S FOR PONG********************************************************/
536 
537  /******************************************************************************************
538  * PROGRAM DMA channel to transfer 2D abs data from accelerator output buffer (pong) to L3
539  ******************************************************************************************/
540  chainingCfg.chainingChan = cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaIn.pong.channel;
541  chainingCfg.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = true;
542  chainingCfg.isFinalChainingEnabled = false;
543 
544  /* Transfer parameters are the same as ping, except for src/dst addresses */
545  syncACfg.srcAddress = (uint32_t)obj->hwaMemBankAddr[1];
546  syncACfg.destAddress = (uint32_t)(&detMatrixBase[sizeOfAbsTransfer]);
547 
548  retVal = DPEDMA_configSyncA_singleFrame(cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaHandle,
549  &cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaOut.pong,
550  &chainingCfg,
551  &syncACfg,
552  true, //isEventTriggered
553  false,//isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled
554  true, //isTransferCompletionEnabled
555  DPU_DopplerProcHWA_edmaDoneIsrCallback, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
556  (uintptr_t)obj->edmaDoneSemaHandle); //transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg
557 
558  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
559  {
560  goto exit;
561  }
562 
563  /******************************************************************************************
564  * PROGRAM DMA channel to transfer data from L3 to accelerator input buffer (pong)
565  ******************************************************************************************/
566  chainingCfg.chainingChan = cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaHotSig.pong.channel;
567  chainingCfg.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = true;
568  chainingCfg.isFinalChainingEnabled = true;
569 
570  /* Transfer parameters are the same as ping, except for src/dst addresses */
571  syncABCfg.srcAddress = (uint32_t)(&radarCubeBase[1]);
572  syncABCfg.destAddress = (uint32_t)(obj->hwaMemBankAddr[1]);
573 
574  retVal = DPEDMA_configSyncAB(cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaHandle,
575  &cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaIn.pong,
576  &chainingCfg,
577  &syncABCfg,
578  false,//isEventTriggered
579  true, //isIntermediateTransferCompletionEnabled
580  false,//isTransferCompletionEnabled
581  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
582  NULL);//transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg
583 
584  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
585  {
586  goto exit;
587  }
588 
589  /******************************************************************************************
590  * PROGRAM DMA channel to trigger HWA for processing of input (pong)
591  ******************************************************************************************/
592  retVal = DPEDMAHWA_configOneHotSignature(cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaHandle,
593  &cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaHotSig.pong,
594  obj->hwaHandle,
595  obj->hwaDmaTriggerSourcePong,
596  false);
597 
598  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
599  {
600  goto exit;
601  }
602 
603 exit:
604  return(retVal);
605 }
606 
607 /*===========================================================
608  * Doppler Proc External APIs
609  *===========================================================*/
610 
627 DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Handle DPU_DopplerProcHWA_init
628 (
629  DPU_DopplerProcHWA_InitParams *initCfg,
630  int32_t *errCode
631 )
632 {
633  DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Obj *obj = NULL;
634  SemaphoreP_Params semParams;
635  HWA_MemInfo hwaMemInfo;
636  uint32_t i;
637 
638  *errCode = 0;
639 
640  if((initCfg == NULL) || (initCfg->hwaHandle == NULL))
641  {
642  *errCode = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_EINVAL;
643  goto exit;
644  }
645 
646  /* Allocate memory */
647  obj = MemoryP_ctrlAlloc(sizeof(DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Obj), 0U);
648  if(obj == NULL)
649  {
650  *errCode = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_ENOMEM;
651  goto exit;
652  }
653 
654  /* Initialize memory */
655  memset((void *)obj, 0U, sizeof(DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Obj));
656 
657  /* Save init config params */
658  obj->hwaHandle = initCfg->hwaHandle;
659 
660  /* Create DPU semaphores */
661  SemaphoreP_Params_init(&semParams);
662  semParams.mode = SemaphoreP_Mode_BINARY;
663  obj->edmaDoneSemaHandle = SemaphoreP_create(0, &semParams);
664  if(obj->edmaDoneSemaHandle == NULL)
665  {
666  *errCode = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_ESEMA;
667  goto exit;
668  }
669 
670  SemaphoreP_Params_init(&semParams);
671  semParams.mode = SemaphoreP_Mode_BINARY;
672  obj->hwaDoneSemaHandle = SemaphoreP_create(0, &semParams);
673  if(obj->hwaDoneSemaHandle == NULL)
674  {
675  *errCode = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_ESEMA;
676  goto exit;
677  }
678 
679  /* Populate HWA base addresses and offsets. This is done only once, at init time.*/
680  *errCode = HWA_getHWAMemInfo(obj->hwaHandle, &hwaMemInfo);
681  if (*errCode < 0)
682  {
683  goto exit;
684  }
685 
686  /* check if we have enough memory banks*/
687  if(hwaMemInfo.numBanks < DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_NUM_HWA_MEMBANKS)
688  {
689  *errCode = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_EHWARES;
690  goto exit;
691  }
692 
693  for (i = 0; i < DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_NUM_HWA_MEMBANKS; i++)
694  {
695  obj->hwaMemBankAddr[i] = hwaMemInfo.baseAddress + i * hwaMemInfo.bankSize;
696  }
697 
698 exit:
699 
700  if(*errCode < 0)
701  {
702  if(obj != NULL)
703  {
704  MemoryP_ctrlFree(obj, sizeof(DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Obj));
705  obj = NULL;
706  }
707  }
708  return ((DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Handle)obj);
709 }
710 
726 int32_t DPU_DopplerProcHWA_config
727 (
728  DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Handle handle,
729  DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Config *cfg
730 )
731 {
732  DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Obj *obj;
733  int32_t retVal = 0;
734  uint16_t expectedWinSamples;
735 
736 
737  obj = (DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Obj *)handle;
738  if(obj == NULL)
739  {
740  retVal = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_EINVAL;
741  goto exit;
742  }
743 
744 #if DEBUG_CHECK_PARAMS
745  /* Validate params */
746  if(!cfg ||
747  !cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaHandle ||
748  !cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.window ||
749  !cfg->hwRes.radarCube.data ||
750  !cfg->hwRes.detMatrix.data
751  )
752  {
753  retVal = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_EINVAL;
754  goto exit;
755  }
756 
757  /* Check if radar cube format is supported by DPU*/
758  if(cfg->hwRes.radarCube.datafmt != DPIF_RADARCUBE_FORMAT_1)
759  {
760  retVal = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_ECUBEFORMAT;
761  goto exit;
762  }
763 
764  /* Check if detection matrix format is supported by DPU*/
765  if(cfg->hwRes.detMatrix.datafmt != DPIF_DETMATRIX_FORMAT_1)
766  {
767  retVal = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_EDETMFORMAT;
768  goto exit;
769  }
770 
771  /* Check if radar cube column fits into one HWA memory bank */
772  if((cfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas * cfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas *
773  cfg->staticCfg.numDopplerChirps * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t)) > (SOC_HWA_MEM_SIZE/SOC_HWA_NUM_MEM_BANKS))
774  {
775  retVal = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_EEXCEEDHWAMEM;
776  goto exit;
777  }
778 
779  /* Check if abs value of log2 of 2D FFT fits in one HWA memory bank */
780  if((cfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas * cfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas *
781  cfg->staticCfg.numDopplerBins * sizeof(uint16_t)) > (SOC_HWA_MEM_SIZE/SOC_HWA_NUM_MEM_BANKS))
782  {
783  retVal = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_EEXCEEDHWAMEM;
784  goto exit;
785  }
786 
787  /* Check if number of range bins is even*/
788  if((cfg->staticCfg.numRangeBins % 2) != 0)
789  {
790  retVal = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_EINVAL;
791  goto exit;
792  }
793 
794  /* Check if detection matrix size is sufficient*/
795  if(cfg->hwRes.detMatrix.dataSize < (cfg->staticCfg.numRangeBins *
796  cfg->staticCfg.numDopplerBins * sizeof(uint16_t)))
797  {
798  retVal = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_EDETMSIZE;
799  goto exit;
800  }
801 
802  /* Check window Size */
803  if(cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.winSym == HWA_FFT_WINDOW_NONSYMMETRIC)
804  {
805  expectedWinSamples = cfg->staticCfg.numDopplerChirps;
806  }
807  else
808  {
809  /* odd samples have to be rounded up per HWA */
810  expectedWinSamples = (cfg->staticCfg.numDopplerChirps + 1) / 2;
811  }
812 
813  if (cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.windowSize != expectedWinSamples * sizeof(int32_t))
814  {
815  retVal = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_EWINDSIZE;
816  goto exit;
817  }
818 #endif
819 
820  /* Save necessary parameters to DPU object that will be used during Process time */
821 
822  /* EDMA parameters needed to trigger first EDMA transfer*/
823  obj->edmaHandle = cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaHandle;
824  memcpy((void*)(&obj->edmaIn), (void *)(&cfg->hwRes.edmaCfg.edmaIn), sizeof(DPU_DopplerProc_Edma));
825 
826  /*HWA parameters needed for the HWA common configuration*/
827  obj->hwaNumLoops = cfg->staticCfg.numRangeBins / 2U;
828  obj->hwaParamStartIdx = cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx;
829  obj->hwaParamStopIdx = cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.numParamSets - 1;
830 
831  /* Disable the HWA */
832  retVal = HWA_enable(obj->hwaHandle, 0);
833  if (retVal != 0)
834  {
835  goto exit;
836  }
837 
838  /* HWA window configuration */
839  retVal = HWA_configRam(obj->hwaHandle,
840  HWA_RAM_TYPE_WINDOW_RAM,
841  (uint8_t *)cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.window,
842  cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.windowSize, //size in bytes
843  cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.winRamOffset * sizeof(int32_t));
844  if (retVal != 0)
845  {
846  goto exit;
847  }
848 
849  /*******************************/
851  /*******************************/
852  /*Compute source DMA channels that will be programmed in both HWA and EDMA.
853  The DMA channels are set to be equal to the paramSetIdx used by HWA*/
854  /* Ping DMA channel (Ping uses the first paramset)*/
855  obj->hwaDmaTriggerSourcePing = cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx;
856  /* Pong DMA channel*/
857  obj->hwaDmaTriggerSourcePong = cfg->hwRes.hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + cfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas + 1;
858  retVal = DPU_DopplerProcHWA_configHwa(obj, cfg);
859  if (retVal != 0)
860  {
861  goto exit;
862  }
863 
864  /*******************************/
866  /*******************************/
867  retVal = DPU_DopplerProcHWA_configEdma(obj, cfg);
868  if (retVal != 0)
869  {
870  goto exit;
871  }
872 
873 exit:
874  return retVal;
875 }
876 
891 int32_t DPU_DopplerProcHWA_process
892 (
893  DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Handle handle,
894  DPU_DopplerProcHWA_OutParams *outParams
895 )
896 {
897  volatile uint32_t startTime;
898  DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Obj *obj;
899  int32_t retVal = 0;
900  bool status;
901  HWA_CommonConfig hwaCommonConfig;
902 
903  obj = (DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Obj *)handle;
904  if (obj == NULL)
905  {
906  retVal = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_EINVAL;
907  goto exit;
908  }
909  /* Set inProgress state */
910  obj->inProgress = true;
911 
912  startTime = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
913 
914  /**********************************************/
915  /* ENABLE NUMLOOPS DONE INTERRUPT FROM HWA */
916  /**********************************************/
917  retVal = HWA_enableDoneInterrupt(obj->hwaHandle,
918  DPU_DopplerProcHWA_hwaDoneIsrCallback,
919  obj->hwaDoneSemaHandle);
920  if (retVal != 0)
921  {
922  goto exit;
923  }
924 
925  /***********************/
926  /* HWA COMMON CONFIG */
927  /***********************/
928  memset((void*) &hwaCommonConfig, 0, sizeof(HWA_CommonConfig));
929 
930  /* Config Common Registers */
931  hwaCommonConfig.configMask =
932  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_NUMLOOPS |
933  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTARTIDX |
934  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTOPIDX |
935  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_FFT1DENABLE |
936  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_INTERFERENCETHRESHOLD;
937 
938  hwaCommonConfig.numLoops = obj->hwaNumLoops;
939  hwaCommonConfig.paramStartIdx = obj->hwaParamStartIdx;
940  hwaCommonConfig.paramStopIdx = obj->hwaParamStopIdx;
941  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.fft1DEnable = HWA_FEATURE_BIT_DISABLE;
942  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.interferenceThreshold = 0xFFFFFF;
943 
944  retVal = HWA_configCommon(obj->hwaHandle, &hwaCommonConfig);
945  if (retVal != 0)
946  {
947  goto exit;
948  }
949 
950  /* Enable the HWA */
951  retVal = HWA_enable(obj->hwaHandle,1);
952  if (retVal != 0)
953  {
954  goto exit;
955  }
956 
957  EDMA_startTransfer(obj->edmaHandle, obj->edmaIn.ping.channel, EDMA3_CHANNEL_TYPE_DMA);
958  EDMA_startTransfer(obj->edmaHandle, obj->edmaIn.pong.channel, EDMA3_CHANNEL_TYPE_DMA);
959 
960  /**********************************************/
961  /* WAIT FOR HWA NUMLOOPS INTERRUPT */
962  /**********************************************/
963  status = SemaphoreP_pend(obj->hwaDoneSemaHandle, SemaphoreP_WAIT_FOREVER);
964 
965  if (status != SemaphoreP_OK)
966  {
967  retVal = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_ESEMASTATUS;
968  goto exit;
969  }
970 
971  HWA_disableDoneInterrupt(obj->hwaHandle);
972 
973  /* Disable the HWA */
974  retVal = HWA_enable(obj->hwaHandle, 0);
975  if (retVal != 0)
976  {
977  goto exit;
978  }
979 
980  /**********************************************/
981  /* WAIT FOR EDMA DONE INTERRUPT */
982  /**********************************************/
983  status = SemaphoreP_pend(obj->edmaDoneSemaHandle, SemaphoreP_WAIT_FOREVER);
984  if (status != SemaphoreP_OK)
985  {
986  retVal = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_ESEMASTATUS;
987  goto exit;
988  }
989 
990  outParams->stats.numProcess++;
991  outParams->stats.processingTime = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime;
992 
993 exit:
994  if (obj != NULL)
995  {
996  obj->inProgress = false;
997  }
998 
999  return retVal;
1000 }
1001 
1016 int32_t DPU_DopplerProcHWA_deinit(DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Handle handle)
1017 {
1018  int32_t retVal = 0;
1019 
1020  /* Free memory */
1021  if(handle == NULL)
1022  {
1023  retVal = DPU_DOPPLERPROCHWA_EINVAL;
1024  }
1025  else
1026  {
1027  MemoryP_ctrlFree(handle, sizeof(DPU_DopplerProcHWA_Obj));
1028  }
1029 
1030  return retVal;
1031 }
